name: Sniper Hero: 3D Shooting Game
description:
The City is in Great Danger! We need your help, our Super Hero!!

If you're a sharpshooter: Pick up your sniper guns, Looking for the busters that are our city's scourge, Shoot on their head, and make our city Back to Order.

If you don't know how to use a sniper gun, it doesn't matter, our Celina is a passionate, kind and patient teacher and she will teach you everything that you need to know.

Features:
◆ The ultimate real 3D city, cool animation and amazing effects
◆ Best sniper experience, ready to get new content at any time.
◆ Various sniper weapons, all kinds of decals, bullets and accessories make you free matching!
◆ Exquisite helmets and clothes, Free-to-wear.
◆ The most realistic simulation experience, shooting, weapons extremely real feeling.
◆ Rich activities, hunting, snipers, race with time, complete the self-transcendence!
◆ Free Download, Conscience Productions

Come and Download to Experience It! Feel the unique wonderful, taste the same happiness!
